00044 
00045 INLINE void cnaf8(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00046                   BYTE * d, int *x, int *q)
00047 {
00048    CNAF_BUF cnaf_buf;
00049 
00050    cnaf_buf.c = c;
00051    cnaf_buf.n = n;
00052    cnaf_buf.a = a;
00053    cnaf_buf.f = f;
00054    cnaf_buf.d = *d;
00055 
00056    ioctl(hcamac, OP_CNAF8, &cnaf_buf);
00057 
00058    *d = (BYTE) cnaf_buf.d;
00059    if (x) {
00060       *x = cnaf_buf.x;
00061       *q = cnaf_buf.q;
00062    }
00063 }
00064 
00065 INLINE void cnaf8_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00066                     BYTE ** d, int r, int m)
00067 {
00068    CNAF_BUF cnaf_buf;
00069 
00070    cnaf_buf.c = c;
00071    cnaf_buf.n = n;
00072    cnaf_buf.a = a;
00073    cnaf_buf.f = f;
00074    cnaf_buf.d = (unsigned long) *d;
00075    cnaf_buf.r = r;
00076    cnaf_buf.m = m;
00077 
00078    ioctl(hcamac, OP_CNAF8R, &cnaf_buf);
00079 
00080    /* increment pointer */
00081    *d += r;
00082 }

00453 
00454 INLINE int cam_lam_wait(int *c, DWORD * lam, int millisec)
00455 {
00456    unsigned int d;
00457    fd_set readfds;
00458    struct timeval timeout;
00459 
00460    FD_ZERO(&readfds);
00461    FD_SET(hcamac, &readfds);
00462 
00463    timeout.tv_sec = millisec / 1000;
00464    timeout.tv_usec = (millisec % 1000) * 1000;
00465 
00466    select(FD_SETSIZE, (void *) &readfds, NULL, NULL, (void *) &timeout);
00467 
00468    if (FD_ISSET(hcamac, &readfds)) {
00469       read(hcamac, &d, 4);
00470       *lam = (1 << (d & 0xFFFF));
00471       *c = (d >> 16);
00472 
00473       return 1;
00474    }
00475 
00476    return 0;
00477 }

00500 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00501 
00502 #define LAM_TABLE_SIZE 10
00503 
00504 struct {
00505    int c;
00506    int n;
00507    void (*isr) (void);
00508 } lam_table[LAM_TABLE_SIZE];
00509 
00510 static int n_lam_registered = 0;
00511 
00512 static void lam_dispatch(int s)
00513 {
00514    int i, n, c;
00515    unsigned int d;
00516 
00517    if (n_lam_registered == 0)
00518       return;                   /* should never happen */
00519 
00520    /* if only one service routine registered, call immediately */
00521    if (n_lam_registered == 1) {
00522       for (i = 0; i < LAM_TABLE_SIZE; i++)
00523          if (lam_table[i].n != 0) {
00524             lam_table[i].isr();
00525             return;
00526          }
00527    }
00528 
00529    /* get C and N from driver */
00530    read(hcamac, &d, 4);
00531    n = (d & 0xFFFF);
00532    c = (d >> 16);
00533 
00534    for (i = 0; i < LAM_TABLE_SIZE; i++)
00535       if (lam_table[i].c == c && lam_table[i].n == n && lam_table[i].isr) {
00536          lam_table[i].isr();
00537       }
00538 }
00539 
00540 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00541 
00542 INLINE void cam_interrupt_attach(int c, int n, void (*isr) (void))
00543 {
00544    int i;
00545 
00546    /* find free entry in lam_table */
00547    for (i = 0; i < LAM_TABLE_SIZE; i++)
00548       if (lam_table[i].isr == NULL)
00549          break;
00550 
00551    if (i == LAM_TABLE_SIZE) {
00552       printf("cam_interrupt_attach: too many service routines registered\n");
00553       return;
00554    }
00555 
00556    lam_table[i].isr = isr;
00557    lam_table[i].c = c;
00558    lam_table[i].n = n;
00559 
00560    n_lam_registered++;
00561 
00562    /* register lam dispatcher to receive asynchronous signal SIGIO on
00563       first call of cam_interrupt_attach */
00564    if (n_lam_registered == 1) {
00565       signal(SIGIO, lam_dispatch);
00566       fcntl(hcamac, F_SETOWN, getpid());
00567       fcntl(hcamac, F_SETFL, fcntl(hcamac, F_GETFL) | FASYNC);
00568    }
00569 }
00570 
00571 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00572 
00573 INLINE void cam_interrupt_detach(int c, int n)
00574 {
00575    int i;
00576 
00577    /* find entry in lam_table */
00578    for (i = 0; i < LAM_TABLE_SIZE; i++)
00579       if (lam_table[i].c == c && lam_table[i].n == n) {
00580          lam_table[i].c = 0;
00581          lam_table[i].n = 0;
00582          lam_table[i].isr = NULL;
00583          n_lam_registered--;
00584       }
00585 
00586    if (n_lam_registered == 0) {
00587       /* remove signal handler */
00588       signal(SIGIO, SIG_DFL);
00589       fcntl(hcamac, F_SETFL, fcntl(hcamac, F_GETFL) & ~FASYNC);
00590    }
00591 }
00592

00595 INLINE int cam_init_rpc(char *host_name, char *exp_name, char *fe_name,
00596                         char *client_name, char *rpc_server)
00597 {
00598    /* dummy routine for compatibility */
00599    return 1;
00600 }
00601 
00602 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00603 
00604 INLINE int cam_init(void)
00605 {
00606    hcamac = open("/dev/camac", 0);
00607    if (hcamac < 0) {
00608       perror("cam_init");
00609       return -1;
00610    }
00611 
00612    return SUCCESS;
00613 }
00614 
00615 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00616 
00617 INLINE void cam_exit(void)
00618 {
00619    close(hcamac);
00620 }
